Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: ~lbendixsen It's a known issue that was described in release notes for indy-node 1.9.0 and sovrin 1.1.50 (but it was in indy-node 1.7.1 too, it was just found during 1.9.0 acceptance testing). See INDY-2164 for more details.

Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: I have confirmed that this problem persists in 1.10.0.Â

Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: I do not see the relationship between this issue ant INDY-2164. I believe that they are separate issues.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Checked against upgraded BuilderNet pool - I got consensus of REJECTs on client when I tried to add Steward by Identity Owner.
